attributes.action: Theresa May should visit the knife sculpture and develop some genuine empathy
attributes.additional_details: If she hasn't been already she should go again. Sadiq Khan should be there too and they should spend a significant amount of time there.
attributes.background: Theresa May's inattentiveness to knife crime has resulted in a huge underfunding of police services, which is unacceptable. It is about time that she realised that we need more, better, police on the streets to protect us from such crimes, as they will not go away on their own.

rejection.details: This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister and Mayor of London, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
